short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Similarweb Sales Extension – Now Featuring Your AI Sidekick: SAM (Sales AI Module)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Great salespeople jump on opportunities the moment they appear. 

That’s why we’ve built an extension, powered by AI and Similarweb’s traffic and engagement data, that will surface detailed insights and tailored messages — exactly when you need them.

With the Similarweb Sales Chrome extension, powered by SAM (Sales AI Module), you'll have the perfect insights on hand for every touchpoint with a prospect. Whether you're looking at:

1. Your target accounts' website
2. Your prospects' LinkedIn profile or company pages
3. An upcoming Google Calendar meeting

🔥It’ll help you answer those burning questions — how do you grab their attention? Where do their opportunities lie? Where are they lagging behind their competitors?

With SAM by your side, it's like adding 3 new team members:
🔬A research guru who prepares a detailed analysis before every meeting 
✍️An outbound messaging expert, ready to grab your prospects' attention
💁A dedicated account assistant who monitors every tiny account detail

And with three new team members dedicated entirely to you smashing your quota, you’ll reap all the benefits, including:
* Increased response rates to outbound messaging
* 10/10 preparation and prospect-tailored insights for any call that’s thrown at you
* More trust instilled in you and your value-driven outreach

📣But the extension doesn't stop at SAM! Here's what else supercharges your B2B sales  efforts:
* Deep company insights: Gain a comprehensive picture of any B2B company with key website data, traffic, and engagement insights, as well as firmographic and technographic details.
* Contact data at the ready: Access contact information for all the key players in your target accounts, eliminating manual searching so you can connect with the right people quickly.

Install the Similarweb Sales Intelligence Chrome extension today and experience the power of AI-driven sales success. 

(If you’re not a Similarweb customer - request SAM Beta access today)
